parameters.name: SaveLastState
parameters.description: True to back up the previous model state prior to activating this 3D View, false to not back up the previous model state prior to activating this 3D view

title: IView3D.Activate

parameters.name: SaveLastState
parameters.description: True to back up the previous model state prior to activating this 3D View, false to not back up the previous model state prior to activating this 3D view

remarks:
The model state includes the model's:
active configuration
display state
explode, section, or Model Break view state
view orientation, including pan and zoom
